sourceText: Millions of people have the same fears as us. Find someone who you can talk to about how you are feeling.
text: Menm sa k fè w pè a fè plizyè milyon moun pè tou. Chèche jwenn yon moun ou ka pale sou sa w santi.

sourceText: Listen to them. Avoid social media that makes you feel panicked.
text: Koute yo. Evite rezo sosyal ki ka fè w santi w panike.

sourceText: You are not alone.
text: Ou pa pou kò w.

sourceText: Take a break.
text: Pran yon poz.

sourceText: Listen to your kids.
text: Koute pitit ou yo.

sourceText: Take a Pause.
text: Pran yon poz.

sourceText: 1-minute relaxation activity that you can do whenever you are feeling stressed or worried.
text: Yon minit aktivite ki rilaks ou ka fè nenpòt lè w santi w estrese oswa w santi w enkyè.

sourceText: Step 1: Set up
text: Etap 1: Mete an plas

sourceText: •	Find a comfortable sitting position, your feet flat on the floor, your hands resting in your lap.
text: • Jwenn yon pozisyon pou w chita yon fason ki konfòtab, pye plat atè a, men w sou jenou w.

sourceText: • 	Close your eyes if you feel comfortable.
text: • Fèmen je si w santi w alèz konsa.

sourceText: Step 2: Think, feel, body
text: Etap 2: Panse, santiman, kò

sourceText: • 	Ask yourself, “What am I thinking now?”
text: • Mande tèt ou, “Sou kisa map panse kounye a?”

sourceText: • 	Notice your thoughts. Notice if they are negative or positive.
text: Analize refleksyon w yo. Disène si yo pozitif oswa negatif.

sourceText: • 	Notice how you feel emotionally. Notice if your feelings are happy or not.
text: • Disène kijan w santi w emosyonèlman. Disène si w kontan oswa si w pa kontan.

sourceText: • 	Notice how your body feels. Notice anything that hurts or is tense.
text: • Disène kijan kò santi l. Èske gen nenpòt bagay k ap fè w mal oswa ki rèd.

sourceText: Step 3: Focus on your breath
text: Etap 3: konsantre w sou respirasyon w

sourceText: • 	Listen to your breath as it goes in and out.
text: • Koute byen lè w ap rale souf ou antre ak pouse l soti.

sourceText: • 	You can put a hand on your stomach and feel it rise and fall with each breath.
text: • Ou ka mete yon men sou vant ou epi santi l k ap monte desann pou chak souf ou pran.

sourceText: • 	You may want to say to yourself “It’s okay.Whatever it is, I am okay.”
text: • Petèt ou ka di tèt ou “Tout bagay anfòm. Kèlkeswa jan sa ye, mwen anfòm.”

sourceText: • 	Then just listen to your breath for a while.
text: • Apre sa jis tande souf ou pou yon ti tan.

sourceText: Step 4: Coming back
text: Etap 4: Retounen

sourceText: • 	Notice how your whole body feels.
text: • Disène kijan tout kò w santi l.

sourceText: • 	Listen to the sounds in the room.
text: • Koute son ki nan chanm nan.

sourceText: Step 5: Reflecting
text: Etap 5: Refleksyon

sourceText: • 	Think “do I feel different at all?”.
text: • Panse “eske m santi m diferan?”.

sourceText: • 	When you are ready, open your eyes.
text: • Lè w santi w pare, ouvè je w.

sourceText: Be open and listen to your children. Your children will look to you for support and reassurance.
text: Se pou w abòdab epi koute pitit ou. Pitit ou ap vin kote w pou yo jwenn èd ak rekonfò.

sourceText: Listen to your children when they share how they are feeling.
text: Koute pitit ou lè yap di w kijan yo santi yo.

sourceText: Accept how they feel and give them  comfort.
text: Aksepte fason yo santi yo epi ba yo rekonfò.

sourceText: Taking a Pause can also be helpful when you find your child is irritating you or has done something wrong. It gives you a chance to be calmer.
text: Pran yon poz kapab ede w tou lè w twouve pitit ou kontrarye w, oswa li fè yon bagay mal. Sa ba w posiblite pou w vin pi kalm.

sourceText: Even a few deep breaths or connecting with the feeling of the floor beneath can make a difference.
text: Kèk respirasyon byen fon pandan yon ti tan oswa konekte w ak atè kote pye w ye a ka fè yon gwo diferans.

sourceText: You can also Take a Pause with your children!
text: Ou ka pran yon poz ak timoun ou yo tou!

sourceText: Keep Calm and Manage Stress
text: Rete kalm epi jere estrès ou

sourceText: Covid-19 Parenting
text: Edikasyon timoun nan peryòd Covid-19

sourceText: This is a stressful time. Take care of yourself, so you can support your children.
text: Sa se yon moman ki bay anpil estrès. Pran swen tèt ou pou w ka ede pitit ou.

sourceText: Parenting tips from WHO
text: Konsèy ki soti nan WHO pou paran

sourceText: Parenting tips from UNICEF
text: Konsèy ki soti nan UNICEF pou paran

sourceText: In worldwide languages
text: Nan tout kalite lang yo pale nan mond lan

sourceText: evidence-base
text: baze sou bonjan prèv

sourceText: For more information click below links:
text: Pou jwenn plis enfòmasyon klike sou lyen ki pi ba yo:

sourceText: We all need a break sometimes. When your children are asleep, do something fun or relaxing for yourself.
text: W ap bezwen yon ti poz pafwa. Lè timoun ou yo ap dòmi fè yon bagay ki amizan epi ki rilaks pou tèt pa ou.

sourceText: Make a list of healthy activities that YOU like to do. You deserve it!
text: Fè yon lis aktivite ki bon pou kò w ak lespri w OU RENMEN fè. Ou merite sa!

sourceText: Partners
text: Patnè yo

sourceText: Funders
text: Moun ki finanse yo
